item.title: Info
item.description: I made this section since I am currently taking the Computer Networking course, and I feel the best way to learn is to explain and educate others. This is my first time trying, and it is still under development. Feel free to roam and learn, any feedback would be nice as well. Under construction OSI model IP Subnetting DHCP & DNS TCP & UDP VLANS Router on a stick OSPF - Baker

item.title: OSI model
